title: Do naturopathic doctors believe in vaccines?
description: Answer (1 of 15): I am not a doctor, but from my experience with Naturopathic Doctors, they would answer this question like they answer most black-and-white ones: NDs believe in doing what is best for the patient, and different things are best for different patients.
